comments.body: formik is trying to remove scheduler but haven't finished yet. I think they'll get it fixed in the next few days.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +1,5 @@Exit Code: 2
Standard output:
node_modules/formik/dist/Formik.d.ts(1,22): error TS6053: File '../../../tests/cases/user/formik/node_modules/formik/dist/types/index.d.ts' not found.
node_modules/formik/dist/Formik.d.ts(23,96): error TS7016: Could not find a declaration file for module 'scheduler'. '../../../tests/cases/user/formik/node_modules/scheduler/index.js' implicitly has an 'any' type.
  Try `npm i --save-dev @types/scheduler` if it exists or add a new declaration (.d.ts) file containing `declare module 'scheduler';`

comments.body: Does this require a fix on our side? Or just a change to react? @weswigham

#26281 is half a fix for it (the intersection on the inside). There's also the `string extends keyof P` in the type that won't simplify, though; that'll need to be remodeled so it can somehow resolve even when `P` is still generic (or just be removed - passing `string` into all the `Pick` and friends calls is probably fine).
